page.title: 16CUFFLEY J.M.I. SCHOOL
page.content: The school was opened in August1938 at a cost of Â£15000 to accommodate 288 pupils. Mr.G.C.Holmes was the first headmaster.Until 1947 children up to the age of 14 were taught.After 1947 the school catered just for 5 to 11 year olds.In 1966 a new building was erected as a separate infants school with its own headmistress.The juniors were left occupying the original building.In 1984 the two schools were amalgamated into a Junior Mixed Infants with 323 pupils. During lunch breaks and after school many clubs are run:Badminton,Netball,Chess,Gymnastics Hockey,Football,Rounders,Choir,Sailing ShortTennis,Drama and a Nature Club. Groups of children go on Educational trips each year.This year they visited Cuffley Camp,The Lake District,The Isle of Wight and Austria, besides many different day visits in classes.
